credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Panzerkreuzer Potemkin [Battleship Potemkin]
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: On black background at top, a white rectangle intersected by two parallel intrusions, one further than the other. Inscription at bottom, in white: "Neue Walter Kirchner zeigt S.M. Eisensteins/ grossen Film uber die Meuterei der russischen Flotte/ Kamera: Eduard Tisse  Pradikat: Besonders wertvoll", followed by "Panzerkreuzer" in white, and "POTEMKIN" in grey.
name: Poster
